paper_abstract: This paper extends, in a multi-dimensional framework, pattern recognition techniques for generation or recognition of digital lines. More precisely, we show how the connection between chain codes of digital lines and continued fractions can be generalized by a connection between tilings and multi-dimensional continued fractions. This leads to a new approach for generating and recognizing digital hyperplanes. (c) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Generation and recognition of digital planes using multi-dimensional continued fractions
